channel.title: 🏢 Institute of Information Engineering, CAS on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Institute of Information Engineering, CAS on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Not All Diffusion Model Activations Have Been Evaluated as Discriminative Features
item.description: Unlocking superior discriminative features from diffusion models, this research reveals key activation properties for effective feature selection, surpassing state-of-the-art methods.
